quote: You often say, “I would give, but only to the deserving.”The trees in your orchard say not so, nor the flocks in your pasture.They give that they may live, for to withhold is to perish.
quote_letters: YOU OFTEN SAY I WOULD GIVE BUT ONLY TO THE DESERVINGTHE TREES IN YOUR ORCHARD SAY NOT SO NOR THE FLOCKS IN YOUR PASTURETHEY GIVE THAT THEY MAY LIVE FOR TO WITHHOLD IS TO PERISH
